text: Saroja Ramamrutham (Tamil: சரோஜா ராமாமிருதம், 28 January 1931 – 14 October 2019), better known by her screen name Baby Saroja, was an Indian actress. She was known for her roles as a child actor in Tamil movies of the late 1930s. She was known as the "Shirley Temple of India" due to her popularity. Her best known roles were Balayogini (1937), Thyagabhoomi (1939) and Kamadhenu (1941). Saroja died on 14 October 2019 at her Chennai home at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Indian movie actors
title: Baby Saroja
